title: Hikone Byobu (miniature reproduction)
description: miniature reproduction of six panel folding screen: at R, a group of four young men and women stand together, talking and flirting, one figure has a small dog on a leash; at L, a larger group of men and women engage in various activities: an older man plays shamisen with a younger woman, others drink tea, read, write, play go, and the shamisen
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
